long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SavePosty makes easy for you to save and organize your your FB posts. 

With a few clicks, you can save your favorite FB post reference to Google Sheets without any hassles and never lose another post again. But that is not all, when saving your posts, you can:

1) Add your own notes
2) Add multiple tags to you posts
3) Automatically save the name of the publisher
4) Save the URL to the original post

Your FB references are saved outside of Facebook, so whatever happens to you FB account, does not impact your saved post references.

With all these features, you will never ( ever ) lose another valuable post.
